title: Strings and Character Operations
concept: This level focuses on string indexing, slicing, searching, replacing and deleting characters, adapted from Snakify string tasks. Implement using character arrays in C.

challenges.title: String Slices & Properties
challenges.description: Given a string s, print on separate lines: (1) the third character, (2) the second to last character, (3) the first five characters, (4) all but the last two characters, (5) characters with even indices, (6) characters with odd indices, (7) the string in reverse, (8) every second character in reverse starting from the last, (9) the length of the string.
challenges.inputDescription: One line: a string s (no spaces or with spaces, up to 200 characters).
challenges.outputDescription: Nine lines according to the description.
examples:
Example: for input 'abcdef', you should output:
 c
 e
 abcde
 abcd
 ace
 bdf
 fedcba
 fdb
 6

tests.expected:
c
e
abcde
abcd
ace
bdf
fedcba
fdb
6

challenges.title: Word Count in Sentence
challenges.description: Given a string consisting of words separated by spaces, determine how many words it has.
challenges.inputDescription: One line: words separated by spaces.
examples:
Input:
Hello world from C

Output:
4

challenges.title: Swap Two Words
challenges.description: Given a string consisting of exactly two words separated by a space, print a new string with the second word first and the first word second.
challenges.inputDescription: One line: two words separated by a single space.
examples:
Input:
hello world

Output:
world hello

challenges.title: First and Last f
challenges.description: Given a string, print the index of the first and the last occurrence of the letter 'f'. Indices are 0-based. If 'f' occurs only once, print its index only once. If 'f' does not occur, print nothing.
challenges.outputDescription: Either one or two integers separated by a space, or empty output.

challenges.title: Second Occurrence of f
challenges.description: Given a string, print the index of the second occurrence of 'f'. If the string contains 'f' only once, print -1. If it does not contain 'f', print -2.

challenges.title: Remove Between First and Last h
challenges.description: Given a string in which letter 'h' occurs at least twice, remove from that string the first occurrence of 'h', the last occurrence of 'h' and all characters between them.
challenges.inputDescription: One line: string s containing at least two 'h'.

challenges.title: Reverse Between First and Last h
challenges.description: Given a string in which letter 'h' occurs at least twice, reverse the sequence of characters between the first and last appearance of 'h' (do not remove any characters).
challenges.inputDescription: One line: string s containing at least two 'h'.
challenges.outputDescription: New string with the middle segment reversed.
examples:
Input:
abchxyzha

Output:
ahzyxh cba (example will differ depending on exact string)

challenges.title: Replace 1 With one
challenges.description: Given a string, replace every digit '1' with the word "one".
examples:
Input:
I have 1 apple

Output:
I have one apple

challenges.title: Remove @ Characters
challenges.description: Given a string, remove all '@' characters.

challenges.title: Replace Middle h With H
challenges.description: Given a string, replace every occurrence of 'h' by 'H', except for the first and the last 'h'.
challenges.inputDescription: One line: string s with at least two 'h'.
